name: Verify product filtering by "Shorts" category
description:
As a user
  I want to filter products by category
  So that I can view specific types of men's products efficiently

steps.name: Given  the user selects the "Shorts" category from the men's options
Then  the user should be redirected to the "Men's Shorts" page
